name: poswald
body:
Paul Oswald

***

I currently [live](http://www.poswald.com/) and work in Tokyo, Japan where I co-founded [MakeLeaps](http://www.makeleaps.jp/) with Jason Winder.

Previously I have lived in Brooklyn, New York, New Jersey and have traveled the world a bit. If you would like to contact me, please hit me up on [twitter](http://twitter.com/poswald/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
